description:
A few years ago we discover something amazing while performing SEO and digital marketing work for some clients. When we took a look at all of our successful clients (companies that consistently attracted new customers on a regular basis without spending a ton of money on advertising), we noticed simple patterns that all of them shared.

It was then we realized that we had discovered a gold mine of knowledge, a series of simple, repeatable steps that any business owner could use for themselves - so we created a 45 minute video course and called it "The Sales Formula". The course includes 10 videos and multiple downloadable PDF Quick Reference Guides you can refer back to any time.

Once we started using The Sales Formula for all our clients, each and every one of them instantly began receiving more phone calls and emailed request for quotes.

The approach is so simple, but its still a night and day difference from how most companies approach getting new clients online.

The best part is that there's no advertising involved. No pay-per-click campaigns, no banner ads, no snail mail or expensive consultants. Everything we learned you can do using your own blog or website.

If you've had enough of people calling you trying to sell you another advertising package, or you've tried everything and given up on ever getting business from the Internet, then you'll love The Sales Formula.

This is a digital marketing course is highly focused on Search Engine Optimization (SEO), Internet Marketing, Digital Marketing, Business Promotion, and sales development.
title: The Sales Formula - Going Beyond SEO to Increase Sales
